〖插图，App暂不支持〗

');
ruleFindUrl:
<js>
var D1 = '::', D2 = '&&';
var link = 'https://m.ebtang.com/m/book/booklistJson?page=searchPage&rows=30&bookRoomOrderByType=6&sortType=&tagIds=&bookRoomWordType=-1&bookRoomUpdateType=-1&bookRoomVipType=-1&bookRoomFinishType=-1&randomString={{Date.now()}}';
var jdoc = JSON.parse(String(java.ajax(link.replace('searchPage', '1'))));
result = jdoc.categoryList.map(v => v.name + D1 + link.replace(/([?&]sortType=)[^?&]*/, '$1'+v.id));
result.unshift('🔹书库'+D1+link);
result = result.join(D2);
</js>
ruleSearchList:
<js>
var jdoc = JSON.parse(String(result));
result = /[?&]searchName/.test(baseUrl)
  ? jdoc.bookList.filter(v => v.name.includes(jdoc.searchName) || v.authorNick.includes(jdoc.searchName))
  : jdoc.bookList;
</js>

ruleBookInfoInit: <js>var ih = java.get('InfoHTML'); result = ih !== java.get('') ? ih : result;</js>

ruleBookContent:
<js>
a=org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(String(result).match(/id="content">([\s\S]*?)<\/div/)[1]).html();



var content=String(result.match(/function\s*getDecode\(\)\{(.*)\}/)[1]);

//还原屏蔽段落

content=content.replace(/\\/g,"/")
.replace(/[A-Z]=~\[\];[A-Z]=\{___.*?[A-Z],\$__\$:\+\+[A-Z]}\;/,"")
.replace(/[A-Z]\.\$__\$/g,"9")
.replace(/[A-Z]\.\$___/g,"8")
.replace(/[A-Z]\.\$\$\$/g,"7")
.replace(/[A-Z]\.\$\$_/g,"6")
.replace(/[A-Z]\.\$_\$/g,"5")
.replace(/[A-Z]\.\$__/g,"4")
.replace(/[A-Z]\._\$\$/g,"3")
.replace(/[A-Z]\._\$_/g,"2")
.replace(/[A-Z]\.__\$/g,"1")
.replace(/[A-Z]\.___/g,"0")
.replace(/\+|"/g,"")
.replace(/[A-Z].*?\(\!\[\]\)\[2\]/,"")
.replace(/\/\/170/g,"x")
.replace(/\/\/106/g,"F")
.replace(/\/\/105/g,"E")
.replace(/\/\/104/g,"D")
.replace(/\/\/103/g,"C")
.replace(/\/\/102/g,"B")
.replace(/\/\/101/g,"A")
.replace(/\/\/114/g,"L")
.replace(/\/\/166/g,"v")
.replace(/\('/,"")
.replace(/'\).*/,"")
.replace(/\/\/74\/{2,3}160\/\/76/g,"\n")
.replace(/\/\/\/\/[A-Z]\._(.{4})/g,"%u$1");
result=String(a+unescape(content));
result=result.replace(/防采集自动加载失败，点击手动加载，不支持阅读模式，请安装最新版浏览器！/,"")

</js>

.replace(/\/\/\/\/u(.{4})/g,"%u$1");
密文=unescape(content)
//放回原位
result=String(a);
result=result.replace(/自动加载/,密文)
//分隔符
.replace(/防采集(，|)/g,"")
.replace(/失败.*?(阅读模式！|浏览器！)/g,"")
.replace(/禁止转码.*?请退出阅读模式！/g,"").replace(/chapter_c\(\)\;/g,"")
</js>

tmp=java.ajax("http://api.zhuishushenqi.com/ranking/gender");
tmp=JSON.parse(tmp);
cate=java.ajax("http://api.zhuishushenqi.com/cats/lv2");
cate=JSON.parse(cate);
result="";
function f(a,b) {
	var x="";y=tmp[a];
	for (i in y) 
{x+=b+y[i].shortTitle+"::/ranking/"+y[i]._id+"&&";}
	result +=x;
	};
function ff(a,b) {
	var x="";y=cate[a];u1="::/book/by-categories?gender=";u2="&type=hot&start={{(searchPage-1)*50}}&limit=50&&"
	for (i in y) {
x+=b+y[i].major+u1+a+"&major="+y[i].major+u2;
		for (j in y[i].mins) {x+=b+y[i].major+"/"+y[i].mins[j]+u1+a+"&major="+y[i].major+"&minor="+y[i].mins[j]+u2;}
	};result +=x;
	};
f("male","男");f("female","女");f("epub","[出版]");
ff("male","男");ff("female","女");ff("press","[出版]");
String(result);
